Wonderboy Nxumalo (1975 August 3, 2008) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke a na-ejikọta ya na ụlọ ọrụ Ardmore Ceramics.
A mụrụ Wonderboy (Thokozani) Nxumalo na Greytown, KwaZulu-Natal, nwa Glodia Kanyile, onye na-elekọta ụlọ
Ọ gara Candabuthule High School n'ebe ahụ

Onye were nne ya n'ọrụ matara banyere nkà nke nwata nwoke ahụ, wee kpọga ya Fée Halsted-Berning nke ụlọ ọrụ Ardmore Ceramics. O mechara nweta ọzụzụ na obibi akwụkwọ site na Caversham Press Education Trust.
N'afọ 1994, Nxumalo sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ Ardmore Ceramics

O mepụtara ngwa ụdị nke ya n'ise ihe, na uri, mkpọsa, na akụkọ na-agagharị na ihe oyiyi, yana iji usoro sgraffito mee ihe ugboro ugboro. Ndị ọ na-achị na-ahụkarị ihe omume akụkọ ihe mere eme na nsogbu ndị dị ugbu a karịa nke ndị ọrụ ibe ya na-akpali akụkọ ọdịnala, na ihe gbasara Agha Anglo-Zulu na ọrịa AIDS. Enwe na ewi na-eme ka mmadụ na ihe osise ya, na-enwekarị mmetụta na-enweghị isi. Ọ gara Wales iji nọchite anya Ardmore na International Ceramics Festival na Aberystwyth n'afọ 2001.

Nxumalo nwụrụ n'ụlọ na Greytown n'afọ 2008, site na ọrịa nke HIV/AIDS kpatara. Ọ dị afọ iri atọ na atọ. Ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya mgbe ọ nwụsịrị gụnyere ihe ngosi gallery na Pietermaritzburg na 2009, Mahadum Boston na Istanbul Biennale na 2011, Gerisch Museum na 2013, na Reina Sofia Museum na 2014. Ahịa nke ákwà e bipụtara na Nxumalo na ya na-akpata ego maka nne ya na maka ogige ụmụ mgbei dị n'ógbè ahụ, Khazimula.
